bibl.title: The Rabbis and the Documents.
bibl.note: The diversity and fluidity manifested in the documents from the Judaean Desert (70-135 A.D.) are the best evidence we have for the state of Jewish law and the authority exercised by the rabbis at the time.
bibl.seg: COTTON Hannah M., The Rabbis and the Documents.
Martin GOODMAN (Ed.), Jews in a Graeco-Roman World (Oxford, 1998) pp. 167-179.

The diversity and fluidity manifested in the documents from the Judaean Desert (70-135 A.D.) are the best evidence we have for the state of Jewish law and the authority exercised by the rabbis at the time.
